translation.en: HERE YOU GO, MY FRIEND. MAKE SURE YOU GET US AS CLOSE AS YOU CAN!
translation.zh: 都准备好了吧？ 你能开得越近越好

translation.en: I'LL GIVE YOU SOMETHING EXTRA IF YOU MAKE IT A GOOD TRIP!
translation.zh: 干得好的话 另外有赏

translation.en: I'M GONNA GET YOU CLOSE, MY FRIEND, BUT NOT TOO CLOSE. YOU DON'T WANT TO BE EATEN.
translation.zh: 我会尽量的 但不能太近 否则会被吃掉

translation.en: - YOU READY, AMIGO? - [ Both ] READY!
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？ -好了！ -好了！

translation.en: ONE, TWO, THREE!
translation.zh: 一、二、三！

translation.en: UH-UH, THIS IS GREAT! SCARED?
translation.zh: 怕吗？ 不怕 好刺激！

translation.en: SEE ANYTHING YET? NO, NOT YET.
translation.zh: 有没有看到什么？ 还没有

translation.en: WHAT WAS THAT? WHOA!
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: [ Boat Engine Sputtering ] HOLD ON.
translation.zh: -抓紧点！　　 -怎么回事？

translation.en: [ Boy ] WHAT'S HAPPENING? [ Man ] HOLD ON!
translation.zh: -抓紧点！　　 -怎么回事？ 镇静点

translation.en: [ Groaning ] MAKE IT STOP!
translation.zh: 叫他们停下来

translation.en: WHAT HAPPENED TO THEM? I DON'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 他们人呢？ 我不知道

translation.en: OH, MY GOD!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: WE'RE GONNA CRASH! WE'RE GONNA CRASH! NO, WE'RE NOT.
translation.zh: -我们要撞上了！ -不会的

translation.en: I'M GONNA CUT THIS LOOSE! LET GO OF THE ROPE! WE'RE GONNA CRASH!
translation.zh: 我先松绑 放掉绳索！

translation.en: - MOVE YOUR HANDS. - [ Crying ] COME ON!
translation.zh: 手拿开 -快拿开！ -快一点

translation.en: HERE WE GO!
translation.zh: 放手！

translation.en: IT'S GONNA BE OKAY, BUD.
translation.zh: 不会有事的

translation.en: ACTUALLY, THOSE ARE HERBIVORES. THEY WOULDN'T BE INTERESTED IN FIGHTING EACH OTHER.
translation.zh: 查理 那些是草食恐龙 所以不会互相攻击 这些是肉食恐龙 它们才喜欢互相蚕食

translation.en: BUT THESE ARE CARNIVORES, AND THEY REALLY LIKE FIGHTING WITH EACH OTHER.
translation.zh: 这些是肉食恐龙 它们才喜欢互相蚕食

translation.en: THEY USE THEIR TEETH AND CLAWS TO RIP EACH OTHER'S THROATS OUT.
translation.zh: 它们用牙和爪子去撕裂对方的喉咙

translation.en: ALAN, HE'S THREE. LET'S WAIT TILL HE'S FIVE.
translation.zh: 阿伦 他才三岁 等五岁再教吧

translation.en: OH, RIGHT. SORRY, CHARLIE.
translation.zh: 查理 抱歉啦 -艾丽 -什么事？

translation.en: ELLIE, IT'S TOM AGAIN. HE HAS TO TALK TO YOU ABOUT THE LAST CHAPTER.
translation.zh: -艾丽 -什么事？ 是汤姆 他要和你谈最后一章

translation.en: JUST TELL HIM I'M NOT GONNA LOSE THE JACK HORNER QUOTE.
translation.zh: 告诉他我一定要引用杰克霍纳的话

translation.en: MY EDITOR THINKS HE'S A PALEONTOLOGIST.
translation.zh: 我的编辑认为他是古生物学家

translation.en: HEY, MARK. HEY, BABE, LOOK WHO'S HERE.
translation.zh: 我的编辑认为他是古生物学家 嗨 马克 你看看是谁来了？

translation.en: THIS IS ALAN.
translation.zh: 这是阿伦

translation.en: HI. NICE TO MEET YOU, ALAN.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: DADDY, THIS IS A HERBIVORE... I'VE HEARD A LOT ABOUT YOU.
translation.zh: 爸爸 这是草食恐龙 他是恐龙先生

translation.en: AND THAT'S THE DINOSAUR MAN. DINOSAUR MAN?
translation.zh: 爸爸 这是草食恐龙 他是恐龙先生 恐龙先生？

translation.en: JACK, SAY MY NAME. IS MY NAME ALAN?
translation.zh: 杰克 我叫什么 是阿伦吗？

translation.en: IS MY NAME ALAN?
translation.zh: 我名字是阿伦吗？

translation.en: HE USED TO KNOW ME.
translation.zh: 它本来知道的

translation.en: [ Laughing ] IT'S SAD.
translation.zh: 伤心吗？

translation.en: HERE YOU GO. THANKS.
translation.zh: -喝咖啡　　 -谢谢

translation.en: SO YOU KNOW MARK'S WORKING FOR THE STATE DEPARTMENT NOW.
translation.zh: 马克现在在国务院做事

translation.en: YEAH. WHAT DO YOU DO, MARK?
translation.zh: 做哪方面的事？

translation.en: INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS, MOSTLY TREATY LAW AND THINGS LIKE THAT.
translation.zh: 国际关系 多半是法律协定之类的事

translation.en: [ Baby Crying ] UH-OH. CALL OF THE WILD ONE.
translation.zh: 小家伙在抗议了 我去看看

translation.en: HERE, I'LL GET HER. YOU GUYS... CATCH UP.
translation.zh: 你们好好聊

translation.en: THANKS, BABE.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: HE'S A GREAT GUY. SO, WHAT ARE YOU WORKING ON NOW?
translation.zh: 他真是个好人 -你目前在研究什么？ -以快盗龙为主

translation.en: RAPTORS, MOSTLY. MY FAVORITE.
translation.zh: -你目前在研究什么？ -以快盗龙为主 我最喜欢的主题

translation.en: DO YOU REMEMBER THE SOUNDS THEY MADE?
translation.zh: 你记得它们的声音吗？

translation.en: I TRY NOT TO.
translation.zh: 我尽量不去想

translation.en: ELLIE, ALL OUR THEORIES ABOUT RAPTOR INTELLIGENCE,
translation.zh: 过去我们对它们智慧和能力的评估

translation.en: WHAT THEY WERE CAPABLE OF-- WE WEREN'T EVEN CLOSE.
translation.zh: 过去我们对它们智慧和能力的评估 相当不正确

translation.en: WE DID CRANIAL SCANS OF A FOSSIL SKULL. TELL ME.
translation.zh: -快告诉我 -我们做过头盖骨化石的扫描

translation.en: WE FOUND WHAT LOOKS LIKE A VERY SOPHISTICATED RESONATING CHAMBER.
translation.zh: 发现了一个精密的共鸣腔

translation.en: SO WE WERE RIGHT? THEY HAD THE ABILITY TO VOCALIZE?
translation.zh: 等一下 所以当初我们说 它们能发声是正确的

translation.en: I'M CONVINCED THAT'S THE KEY TO THEIR SOCIAL INTELLIGENCE.
translation.zh: 我确信这是它们群居的关键

translation.en: WHICH EXPLAINS WHY THEY COULD WORK TOGETHER AS A TEAM.
translation.zh: 也解释了它们的团队行动

translation.en: AND COORDINATE THEIR ATTACKS SO THE PREY WOULDN'T KNOW WHAT WAS GOING ON.
translation.zh: 能协调攻击而不让被捕食者发现

translation.en: - THEY COULD TALK TO EACH OTHER. - TO A DEGREE WE NEVER IMAGINED.
translation.zh: 它们能互相交谈 而且已超出我们的想象

translation.en: - [ Sighs ] - ELLIE, THEY WERE SMART.
translation.zh: 它们很聪明

translation.en: THEY WERE SMARTER THAN DOLPHINS OR WHALES.
translation.zh: 比海豚、鲸鱼更聪明

translation.en: THEY WERE SMARTER THAN PRIMATES.
translation.zh: 甚至比灵长类还要聪明

translation.en: I JUST WANT TO SAY, IF YOU EVER NEED HELP WITH ANYTHING--
translation.zh: 我只想说如果你需要帮忙

translation.en: SOMETIMES YOU FORGET TO ASK.
translation.zh: 别忘了找我

translation.en: SO YOU CAN CALL ME.
translation.zh: 尽管打电话来

translation.en: SURE. ANYTHING, ANYTIME.
translation.zh: 任何时间、任何事都行 好的

translation.en: YOU'RE STILL THE BEST.
translation.zh: 你仍是最杰出的

translation.en: I MEAN THAT.
translation.zh: 这是真心话

translation.en: THE LAST OF MY BREED.
translation.zh: 可惜我是仅存的一个

translation.en: [ Alan's Voice ] THROUGH THE PAINSTAKING STUDY OF THE ANTERIOR CHAMBER...
translation.zh: 经过多重的前腔研究

translation.en: IN MULTIPLE SPECIMENS, WE CAN DETERMINE THE EXCITING CORRELATION...
translation.zh: 经过多重的前腔研究 我们确定了上颚和喉头的关联

translation.en: BETWEEN THE UPPER PALATE AND THE LARYNX.
translation.zh: 我们确定了上颚和喉头的关联

translation.en: THIS LETS US THEORIZE-- THEORIZE, MIND YOU--
translation.zh: 依此推断 注意这是推断

translation.en: THAT THE RAPTOR WAS CAPABLE OF SOPHISTICATED VOCALIZATIONS...
translation.zh: 依此推断 注意这是推断 快盗龙是可以发声的

translation.en: WHICH WOULD HAVE BEEN A TREMENDOUS EVOLUTIONARY ADVANTAGE.
translation.zh: 由此可见这是一个巨大的进化

translation.en: RAPTORS WERE FIERCE, INTELLIGENT AND SOCIALLY SOPHISTICATED.
translation.zh: 快盗龙凶猛、聪明 而且有社交能力

translation.en: THEY WERE ABLE TO HUNT IN NUMBERS... AND COORDINATE THEIR EFFORTS.
translation.zh: 他们知道分组出去猎食 并且能互相协调

translation.en: WERE IT NOT FOR THE CATACLYSMIC EVENTS WHICH OVERTOOK THEM,
translation.zh: 若不是洪水使它们绝迹

translation.en: IT IS ENTIRELY POSSIBLE THAT RAPTORS RATHER THAN HUMANS...
translation.zh: 如今控制地球生物的

translation.en: WOULD HAVE BECOME THE DOMINANT SPECIES ON THIS PLANET.
translation.zh: 很可能不是人类 而是快盗龙

translation.en: I HOPE THIS HAS BEEN OF INTEREST.
translation.zh: 希望这能引起你们的兴趣

translation.en: IT CERTAINLY EXCITES US AS PALEONTOLOGISTS.
translation.zh: 做为一个古生物学者 这个发现着实让我很兴奋

translation.en: SORRY. THERE'S MUCH, MUCH MORE TO DISCOVER.
translation.zh: 还有许多东西有待发掘

translation.en: THAT IS WHY WE CONTINUE TO NEED AND ASK FOR YOUR SUPPORT.
translation.zh: 因此我们不断地请求你们的支持

translation.en: THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: THANK YOU VERY MUCH, DR. GRANT.
translation.zh: 非常谢谢格兰特博士

translation.en: NOW, DOES ANYONE HAVE A QUESTION?
translation.zh: 有问题吗？

translation.en: FINE. DOES ANYONE HAVE A QUESTION THAT DOES NOT RELATE TO JURASSIC PARK?
translation.zh: 好 谁有和侏罗纪公园无关的问题

translation.en: OR THE INCIDENT IN SAN DIEGO... WHICH I DID NOT WITNESS?
translation.zh: 或是和我未参与的 圣地亚哥事件无关的问题？

translation.en: YES, SIR?
translation.zh: 您的问题？

translation.en: YOUR THEORY ON RAPTORS IS GOOD AND ALL, BUT ISN'T ALL THIS CONJECTURE MOOT?
translation.zh: 快盗龙的理论很好 但都是猜测 是不是？

translation.en: ONCE THE U.N. AND COSTA RICA AND EVERYONE DECIDES HOW TO HANDLE THAT SECOND ISLAND,
translation.zh: 一旦联合国和哥斯达黎加 决定如何处置第二个岛屿后

translation.en: SCIENTISTS WILL JUST GO IN AND LOOK FOR THEMSELVES.
translation.zh: 科学家一定会自行进入寻求线索

translation.en: DINOSAURS LIVED 65 MILLION YEARS AGO.
translation.zh: 恐龙生存在六千五百万年前

translation.en: WHAT IS LEFT OF THEM IS FOSSILIZED IN THE ROCKS.
translation.zh: 如今都已变成化石

translation.en: AND IT IS IN THE ROCK THAT REAL SCIENTISTS MAKE REAL DISCOVERIES.
translation.zh: 所以真正的发现 是从岩石中得来的

translation.en: NOW, WHAT JOHN HAMMOND AND INGEN DID AT JURASSIC PARK...
translation.zh: 汉蒙和遗传国际公司所做的

translation.en: IS CREATE GENETICALLY ENGINEERED THEME PARK MONSTERS,
translation.zh: 是在侏罗纪公园内 以基因制造出巨兽

translation.en: NOTHING MORE AND NOTHING LESS.
translation.zh: 如此而已

translation.en: ARE YOU SAYING THAT YOU WOULDN'T WANT TO GET ONTO ISLA SORNA... AND STUDY THEM, IF YOU HAD THE CHANCE?
translation.zh: 这么说即使有机会 你也不会到索拿岛去做研究？

translation.en: NO FORCE ON EARTH OR HEAVEN COULD GET ME ON THAT ISLAND.
translation.zh: 没有任何力量能让我去那个岛屿

translation.en: SO, WHAT WE GOT HERE, NASHY?
translation.zh: 奈许 都有什么武器？

translation.en: IRON HORN 20-MILLIMETER, GAS-OPERATED, SEMIAUTOMATIC,
translation.zh: 20毫米铁角龙 是半自动瓦斯操作

translation.en: TEN-SHOT MAGAZINE, ROTATING BOLT,
translation.zh: 十发旋转子弹

translation.en: RECOIL-REDUCING MUZZLE BREAK, HIGH EXPLOSIVE INCENDIARY--
translation.zh: 减低后座力的枪支 烈性炸药、燃烧弹…

translation.en: UDESKY. [ Ringing Continues ]
translation.zh: 我是余戴斯

translation.en: MR. UDESKY, THIS IS PAUL KIRBY. JUST CHECKING-- OH, YES, SIR.
translation.zh: 我是保罗 想问问看… 是的 我们这里已经准备就绪

translation.en: WE'RE GOOD TO GO HERE. AS A MATTER OF FACT,
translation.zh: 是的 我们这里已经准备就绪 等钱一付一切就搞定

translation.en: I CAN LOCK THINGS DOWN JUST AS SOON AS YOU DROP ME THAT PAYMENT.
translation.zh: 等钱一付一切就搞定

translation.en: WELL, THAT'S RIGHT. TWO OF THE VERY BEST MEN I COULD POSSIBLY FIND.
translation.zh: 不错 这两个是最好的人选 你和他们一起工作过吗？

translation.en: HAVE YOU WORKED WITH THESE MEN? NO, SIR, I HAVEN'T WORKED WITH THEM PERSONALLY.
translation.zh: 你和他们一起工作过吗？ 虽然没有一起工作过

translation.en: BUT, BELIEVE ME, SIR, BOTH OF THESE MEN COME VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
translation.zh: 但介绍人极力推荐他们

translation.en: [ Paul ] ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT, SIR.
translation.zh: 没事 你放心

translation.en: IT'S GONNA BE A WALK IN THE PARK.
translation.zh: 一定能轻松地达成任务

translation.en: BILLY, I DON'T THINK I'M DOING THIS RIGHT.
translation.zh: 比利 我的方法可能不对

translation.en: LET'S TRY THE TOOTHBRUSH.
translation.zh: 用牙刷试试看

translation.en: YOU GOT TO GO SLOWLY.
translation.zh: 一定要慢慢来

translation.en: JUST TAKE A LITTLE BIT AT A TIME.
translation.zh: 一次一点

translation.en: I CAN NEVER TELL WHAT'S ROCK AND WHAT'S BONE.
translation.zh: 我老分不清岩石和骨头

translation.en: TECHNICALLY, IT'S ALL ROCK.
translation.zh: 我老分不清岩石和骨头 其实都是岩石

translation.en: THE CALCIUM IN THE BONES IS REPLACED DURING FOSSILIZATION.
translation.zh: 只不过骨头里的钙被石化而已

translation.en: BUT YOU CAN FEEL THE DIFFERENCE. SEE?
translation.zh: 你可以感到它们的不同 你瞧

translation.en: ROUGH... SMOOTH.
translation.zh: 粗糙、光滑

translation.en: ROUGH, SMOOTH.
translation.zh: 粗糙、光滑

translation.en: DR. GRANT.
translation.zh: 格兰特博士

translation.en: MR. BRENNAN.
translation.zh: 比利

translation.en: SO, HOW'D IT GO?
translation.zh: 有收获吗？

translation.en: WELL, IT'S NOT TOO LATE TO CHANGE YOUR MAJOR, BILLY.
translation.zh: 你还来得及改变主修科目

translation.en: NOT GOOD, HUH? WORSE.
translation.zh: 看来不太好 很糟 我们只剩四个礼拜的经费

translation.en: WE'RE GONNA HAVE TO PACK UP IN FOUR WEEKS. THREE.
translation.zh: 很糟 我们只剩四个礼拜的经费 三个礼拜

translation.en: I HAD TO RENT EQUIPMENT. COME HERE, I GOTTA SHOW YOU SOMETHING.
translation.zh: 我租了一些设备 我给你看点东西

translation.en: I LIKE THE ABACUS, BILLY. YOU LIKE COMPUTERS, RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你喜欢电脑 对不对？ 我还喜欢算盘呢

translation.en: MEET THE FUTURE OF PALEONTOLOGY. IT'S A RAPID PROTOTYPER.
translation.zh: 这就是古生物学的未来 这是快速原型机

translation.en: I ENTER IN THE SCAN DATA FROM THE RAPTOR'S SKULL.
translation.zh: 我把快盗龙头骨资料输入进去

translation.en: THE COMPUTER BREAKS IT DOWN INTO THOUSANDS OF SLICES.
translation.zh: 电脑把它分成上千的切片

translation.en: THEN THIS THING SCULPTS IT, ONE LAYER AT A TIME.
translation.zh: 然后这个设备就开始造型 一次一层

translation.en: IT'S DONE. [ Beeps ]
translation.zh: 然后这个设备就开始造型 一次一层 （原型完成） 好了

translation.en: I GIVE YOU THE RESONATING CHAMBER OF A VELOCIRAPTOR.
translation.zh: 这就是快盗龙的共鸣腔

translation.en: LISTEN TO THIS.
translation.zh: 你听

translation.en: WOW. THIS IS BRILLIANT, BILLY. REALLY, IT IS.
translation.zh: 哇 太高明了

translation.en: SAD TO SAY, IT'S JUST A LITTLE BIT LATE. [ Footsteps Approaching ]
translation.zh: 只可惜晚了点

translation.en: DR. GRANT? PAUL KIRBY. KIRBY ENTERPRISES.
translation.zh: 格兰特博士吗？ 我是克比企业公司的保罗

translation.en: UH, MY CARD. HOW YOU DOING, BILLY?
translation.zh: 这是我的名片 比利 你好

translation.en: WHAT CAN I DO FOR YOU, MR. KIRBY?
translation.zh: 有什么能为你效劳？

translation.en: WELL, UM, FIRST THING, I'M A GREAT ADMIRER OF YOURS,
translation.zh: 首先 我非常崇拜你

translation.en: AND I HAVE A PROPOSITION I'D LIKE TO DISCUSS WITH YOU.
translation.zh: 其次 有个建议想和你讨论

translation.en: WOULD YOU HAVE DINNER WITH MY WIFE AND ME THIS EVENING? IT'LL BE OUR TREAT.
translation.zh: 请你赏光今晚跟我和我妻子共进晚餐 由我们请客

translation.en: WELL, THAT'D BE GREAT, BUT I'M TIRED. I'VE BEEN TRAVELING.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的好意 我才旅行回来 很累

translation.en: BELIEVE ME, THIS WILL BE WORTH YOUR WHILE. MAYBE SOME OTHER TIME.
translation.zh: 改天吧 相信我 这很值得

translation.en: WE'D LOVE TO. OH, TERRIFIC.
translation.zh: -就这么说定了 -太好了

translation.en: THAT'S THE SPIRIT. GOOD. THIS EVENING THEN.
translation.zh: 我最欣赏这种精神 那就今晚见

translation.en: OH, BILLY. DR. GRANT. HOW ARE YOU? MRS. KIRBY, HOW ARE YOU? AMANDA, BILLY.
translation.zh: 你好 很高兴见到你 克比太太 你好

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU BOYS DRINKING?
translation.zh: 你们要喝什么？

translation.en: ICE PICK, CATFISH. TWO, PLEASE, CAT.
translation.zh: -冰钻鸡尾酒 -来两杯 我们很崇拜你的工作

translation.en: REALLY TRULY INSPIRING. WE'VE ADMIRED YOUR WORK FOR YEARS.
translation.zh: 我们很崇拜你的工作 非常具有启发性

translation.en: AMANDA AND I JUST LOVE THE OUTDOORS.
translation.zh: 阿曼达和我很喜爱户外生活

translation.en: HECK, WE'VE BEEN ON JUST ABOUT EVERY ADVENTURE TOUR THEY CAN COME UP WITH.
translation.zh: 几乎参加过所有的探险团

translation.en: THE NILE, GALAPAGOS, K2.
translation.zh: 像尼罗河、加拉帕哥斯群岛 喀喇昆仑山脉…

translation.en: WE EVEN HAVE TWO SEATS RESERVED ON THE FIRST COMMERCIAL FLIGHT TO THE MOON.
translation.zh: 我们甚至预订了月球首航之旅

translation.en: AND FOR OUR WEDDING ANNIVERSARY THIS YEAR WE WANTED TO DO SOMETHING REALLY SPECIAL.
translation.zh: 所以在我们结婚纪念那天 想做点特别的活动

translation.en: ONCE IN A LIFETIME. SOMETHING-- SO...
translation.zh: 那种一生难忘的事 所以我们包了一架飞机 到索拿岛去探险

translation.en: I'VE CHARTERED AN AIRPLANE TO FLY US OVER ISLA SORNA...
translation.zh: 所以我们包了一架飞机 到索拿岛去探险

translation.en: AND WE'D LIKE YOU TO BE OUR GUIDE.
translation.zh: 希望你做我们的向导

translation.en: THERE YOU GO, GUYS.
translation.zh: 酒来了

translation.en: THAT'S A VERY KIND OFFER, MR. KIRBY, BUT I'M A VERY, VERY BUSY MAN.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的赏识 可是我很忙 不过倒可以介绍几个 非常合格的人给你

translation.en: I CAN RECOMMEND A COUPLE OF GUYS WHO ARE REALLY HIGHLY QUALIFIED THAT--
translation.zh: 不过倒可以介绍几个 非常合格的人给你

translation.en: NO, NO, NO. YOU'RE THE BEST.
translation.zh: 不 你曾亲眼看过它们 所以最合适

translation.en: YOU'VE SEEN THESE ANIMALS IN THE FLESH. THERE'S NO ONE THAT EVEN COMES CLOSE TO YOU.
translation.zh: 不 你曾亲眼看过它们 所以最合适 你甚至曾和它们面对面过

translation.en: YOU WOULDN'T BE ABLE TO FLY LOW ENOUGH TO SEE ANYTHING OF ANY REAL INTEREST.
translation.zh: 但依规定不能低飞 所以你根本看不到什么

translation.en: WELL, SEE? THAT'S THE INTERESTING PART... BECAUSE WE HAVE PERMISSION TO FLY LOW.
translation.zh: 妙就妙在他们特许我们低飞

translation.en: [ Billy ] HOW LOW? I'M NO AVIATION EXPERT,
translation.zh: 多低？ 我不是飞航专家 但我知道比任何人都低

translation.en: BUT A HECK OF A LOT LOWER THAN ANYBODY ELSE, I CAN TELL YOU.
translation.zh: 我不是飞航专家 但我知道比任何人都低

translation.en: FROM WHAT I UNDERSTAND, IT'S PRETTY MUCH-- IT'S WHATEVER WE WANT.
translation.zh: 就我所知 要多低都行

translation.en: THAT'S HARD TO BELIEVE. YOU SEE, THROUGH MY BUSINESS DEALINGS--
translation.zh: 真难以相信 因为我的公司所经营的进出口业务

translation.en: IMPORT, EXPORT, EMERGING MARKETS--
translation.zh: 因为我的公司所经营的进出口业务

translation.en: I'VE MADE A LOT OF FRIENDS IN HIGH PLACES.
translation.zh: 使我结交了不少高层朋友

translation.en: IN THIS CASE, THE COSTA RICAN GOVERNMENT.
translation.zh: 连哥斯达黎加的政府也不例外

translation.en: DR. GRANT, YOU HAVE NO IDEA HOW IMPORTANT IT IS TO US THAT YOU COME ALONG.
translation.zh: 你的参与对我们非常重要

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY, I-I-- IT WOULD MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE.
translation.zh: 因为这是成功的关键 克比太太… 我们也愿意捐款支持你的研究

translation.en: AND, OF COURSE, WE'D LOVE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION TO YOUR RESEARCH HERE. SO--
translation.zh: 我们也愿意捐款支持你的研究

translation.en: I COULD WRITE ALL KINDS OF NUMBERS ON THIS CHECK, DR. GRANT.
translation.zh: 任何数目都行

translation.en: TELL ME...
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: WHAT'S IT GONNA TAKE?
translation.zh: 要多少钱？

translation.en: EVEN WITH WHAT I PAY YOU, COULDN'T YOU AFFORD A BETTER BAG?
translation.zh: 我付你的钱不少 买个好点的袋子吧

translation.en: NO WAY. THIS ONE'S LUCKY.
translation.zh: 那可不行 这是我的幸运袋

translation.en: A COUPLE YEARS AGO, SOME BUDDIES AND I...
translation.zh: 几年前 我和朋友

translation.en: WENT HANG GLIDING OFF THESE CLIFFS IN NEW ZEALAND...
translation.zh: 几年前 我和朋友 到新西兰的峭壁上做滑翔飞行

translation.en: AND THIS BIG UPDRAFT CAME AND SWEPT ME RIGHT AGAINST THE SIDE, WHAM!
translation.zh: 上升气流突然把我扫到一边

translation.en: WOW, THAT DOES SOUND LUCKY.
translation.zh: 那的确很幸运

translation.en: THIS STRAP ALONE SAVED MY LIFE.
translation.zh: 就是这条背带救了我

translation.en: GOT HOOKED ON A ROCK AS I WAS FALLING.
translation.zh: 当我跌落时它刚好钩在岩石上

translation.en: REVERSE DARWINISM: SURVIVAL OF THE MOST IDIOTIC.
translation.zh: 跟达尔文进化论刚好相反 “愚者生存”

translation.en: ALAN, I WANT TO THANK YOU FOR BRINGING ME ALONG.
translation.zh: 谢谢你带我一起来

translation.en: YEAH, WELL, THE BONES WILL STILL BE THERE WHEN WE GET BACK.
translation.zh: 反正回去后骨头仍然在

translation.en: THAT'S THE GREAT THING ABOUT BONES: THEY NEVER RUN AWAY.
translation.zh: 研究骨头的好处就是它跑不了

translation.en: THE TRUTH IS, YOU GOT ME INTO THIS,
translation.zh: 当初是你把我扯进来

translation.en: AND I HAVE NO INTENTION OF BEING ON MY OWN WITH THESE PEOPLE.
translation.zh: 我可不想独自应付这些人

translation.en: DON'T GET TOO EXCITED, BILLY.
translation.zh: 别太兴奋

translation.en: CHANCES ARE WE WON'T SEE A THING.
translation.zh: 很可能什么也看不到

translation.en: YOUR TURN TO BE NICE. WAKE ME WHEN WE GET THERE.
translation.zh: 好啦 到时候拜托叫醒我

translation.en: SO, HOW DO YOU KNOW THE KIRBYS?
translation.zh: 你怎么认识克比的？

translation.en: UH, THROUGH OUR CHURCH.
translation.zh: 在教堂认识的

translation.en: [ Snarling ] ALAN.
translation.zh: 阿伦

translation.en: [ Gasps ] ALAN.
translation.zh: 阿伦 醒醒 我们快到了

translation.en: WAKE UP. WE'RE ALMOST THERE.
translation.zh: 醒醒 我们快到了

translation.en: [ Man Over Headphones ] UNIDENTIFIED AIRCRAFT APPROACHING ISLA SORNA, THIS IS SAN JUAN APPROACH.
translation.zh: 这里是圣胡安 一架不明飞机正接近索拿岛

translation.en: YOU'RE FLYING IN RESTRICTED AIRSPACE. IMMEDIATELY TURN TO COORDINATES TWO--
translation.zh: 你在禁区飞行 请尽速回头…

translation.en: MY GOD, I'D FORGOTTEN.
translation.zh: 天呀 我几乎都忘了

translation.en: WE DID IT, HONEY. WE'RE HERE.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们终于到了

translation.en: [ Udesky ] COOPER, IF YOU SEE ANYTHING, YELL UP.
translation.zh: 古伯 如果看到什么就大叫

translation.en: NO, I THOUGHT I'D KEEP IT TO MYSELF.
translation.zh: 不是说不准叫吗？

translation.en: I'M SORRY. EVERYONE, IF YOU LOOK OUT THE LEFT OF THE PLANE, YOU CAN SEE A WHOLE HERD OF BRACHIOSAURS.
translation.zh: 各位 从左边看过去 你们会看到成群的腕龙

translation.en: IN FACT, YOU CAN SEE IN THE FRONT OF THE GROUP, THE ALPHA MALE GRAZING THERE.
translation.zh: 雄性首领走在队伍的最前面

translation.en: UDESKY, NASH, HOW 'BOUT UP FRONT? YOU GUYS SEE ANYTHING?
translation.zh: 余戴斯、奈许 前面有东西吗？

translation.en: NOTHING YET, MR. KIRBY.
translation.zh: 什么也没有

translation.en: YOU MEAN-- MRS. KIRBY, LOOK. OUT HERE YOU'LL SEE A GROUP OF TRICERATOPS--
translation.zh: 从这边看过去是一群三角龙… 克比先生 这里有跑道 要降落吗？

translation.en: MR. KIRBY, WE HAVE A LANDING STRIP UP AHEAD. YOU WANT ME TO PUT HER DOWN?
translation.zh: 克比先生 这里有跑道 要降落吗？

translation.en: NO, NO. I TOLD YOU, I WANT TO CIRCLE FIRST, SEE THE WHOLE ISLAND.
translation.zh: 不要 先绕全岛一圈

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU MEAN SET IT DOWN? YOU CAN'T LAND HERE.
translation.zh: 你是什么意思？不能在这里降落…

translation.en: - WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? - HOLD ON. I CAN EXPLAIN.
translation.zh: 等一下 我可以解释… 你绝不能在这岛上降落！

translation.en: -YOU CANNOT LAND ON THIS ISLAND. -IT'S GONNA BE FINE. YOU JUST DON'T UNDERSTAND.
translation.zh: 你绝不能在这岛上降落！ -别担心… -没事的 你…

translation.en: - ARE YOU CRAZY? - [ Paul ] SIT DOWN, PLEASE.
translation.zh: -你疯啦 -拜托坐下来 格兰特博士 请你先坐下来

translation.en: [ Thump ] DR. GRANT, WILL YOU PLEASE SIT DOWN?
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 请你先坐下来

translation.en: BILLY, TELL ME WE DIDN'T LAND.
translation.zh: 比利 我们没降落吧？

translation.en: [ Amanda ] ERIC? ERIC?
translation.zh: 艾瑞克、宾 你们在哪里？

translation.en: BEN? ERIC? I THINK THEY'RE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克、宾 你们在哪里？ 他们似乎在找人

translation.en: [ Paul ] OH, DR. GRANT, ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？抱歉我们打…

translation.en: I'M SORRY WE HAD TO BE SO-- WHO HIT ME? WHO HIT ME?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？抱歉我们打… 谁打我的？

translation.en: THAT WOULD BE COOPER.
translation.zh: 是古伯 他们在做什么？

translation.en: THEY'RE SETTING UP A PERIMETER TO MAKE THE PLACE SAFE. WHAT ARE THEY DOING?
translation.zh: 清理四周 使这里更安全

translation.en: THESE GUYS ARE GOOD. ON THIS ISLAND, THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS SAFE.
translation.zh: 相信我 这里没有安全的地方

translation.en: [ Amanda ] ERIC! WE HAVE TO GET BACK ON THAT PLANE.
translation.zh: 我们最好回到飞机上

translation.en: WILL YOU TELL YOUR WIFE TO STOP MAKING THAT NOISE?
translation.zh: 让你太太别叫了 这样太危险

translation.en: AMANDA! THAT IS A VERY, VERY BAD IDEA.
translation.zh: 让你太太别叫了 这样太危险 阿曼达

translation.en: BEN? AMANDA? HONEY?
translation.zh: 阿曼达 格兰特博士说那样很危险

translation.en: WHAT? DR. GRANT SAID THAT'S A BAD IDEA.
translation.zh: 阿曼达 格兰特博士说那样很危险 什么？ 他说太危险

translation.en: - HE SAYS IT'S A BAD IDEA! - WHAT'S A BAD IDEA?
translation.zh: 他说太危险 什么危险？

translation.en: - [ Dinosaur Roaring ] - WHAT WAS THAT?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: THAT'S A TYRANNOSAURUS.
translation.zh: 是霸王龙

translation.en: [ Gunshots ] I DON'T THINK SO. IT SOUNDS BIGGER.
translation.zh: 不是 比霸王龙还要大

translation.en: WE HAVE TO LEAVE! WE HAVE TO LEAVE NOW!
translation.zh: 我们得马上离开

translation.en: [ Shouting, Indistinct ] [ Paul ] WHAT'S GOING ON?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？ 到飞机上去

translation.en: GET IN THE PLANE!
translation.zh: 到飞机上去

translation.en: COOPER'S A PROFESSIONAL. HE CAN HANDLE HIMSELF. WHAT ABOUT THE OTHER GUY?
translation.zh: 另外那个人呢？ 古伯能保护自己的

translation.en: - [ Roaring, Gunshots ] - GET IN THE PLANE! HURRY!
translation.zh: 快上去！

translation.en: IT'S ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 别怕

translation.en: PAUL, WE CAN'T-- IT'S ALL RIGHT. WE'LL JUST CIRCLE THE ISLAND.
translation.zh: -保罗 我们不能… -没关系 我们只绕着岛飞

translation.en: GIVE ME A HAND, UDESKY.
translation.zh: 帮我一下

translation.en: STOP!
translation.zh: 喂！停下来！

translation.en: THAT'S COOPER. WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
translation.zh: -你怎么搞的？ -那是古伯！

translation.en: - PLEASE STOP. - COOP, GET OUT OF THE WAY.
translation.zh: 求求你停下来 走开

translation.en: - [ Sobs ] - YOU KNOW I CAN'T STOP THIS PLANE.
translation.zh: 你知道我不能停

translation.en: - [ Screams ] - OH, MY GOD!
translation.zh: 天呀！

translation.en: - [ Udesky ] - WE'RE GOING DOWN! FUEL CUT OFF!
translation.zh: -燃料被切断！ -我们要坠毁了！

translation.en: YOU OKAY?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: [ Udesky ] WE'RE OKAY UP HERE.
translation.zh: 我们也没事

translation.en: EVERYONE JUST STAY PUT. SAN JUAN APPROACH, MAYDAY!
translation.zh: 大家别乱动 呼叫圣胡安 请求援助

translation.en: - WHO HAS THE SATELLITE PHONE? - I DO.
translation.zh: 谁有卫星电话？ 我有

translation.en: - I GOT IT RIGHT HERE. - I'M NOT GETTING ANYTHING. THE RADIO'S GONE.
translation.zh: 就在这里 无线电通话器坏了

translation.en: WE HAVEN'T LANDED YET.
translation.zh: 我们还没着陆呢

translation.en: [ Recording ] ALL CIRCUITS ARE BUSY. DAMN IT! OH, MAN.
translation.zh: -所有线路都在忙线中 -该死

translation.en: WHAT WAS THAT? [ Gasps ]
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: - [ Screaming ] - KEEP STILL! KEEP STILL! WHAT?
translation.zh: 不要动 别乱动！ 怎么了？你看见什么了？

translation.en: WHAT IS IT? WHAT?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: WHAT IS IT? HOLD IT!
translation.zh: -到底是什么？ -抓稳了

translation.en: HANG ON, EVERYONE!
translation.zh: 大家抓紧

translation.en: NO! NO! HELP ME!
translation.zh: 救命呀！

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY, COME BACK!
translation.zh: 克比太太 快回来！

translation.en: AMANDA! [ Dinosaur Roaring ]
translation.zh: 阿曼达！

translation.en: FOLLOW ME! THIS WAY!
translation.zh: 跟着我 往这边走

translation.en: IN HERE!
translation.zh: 到这里来！

translation.en: I THINK WE LOST HIM.
translation.zh: 应该甩掉它了

translation.en: [ Flies Buzzing ] IT'S OKAY, IT'S DEAD.
translation.zh: 没关系 是死的

translation.en: NOBODY MOVE A MUSCLE.
translation.zh: 大家都不准动

translation.en: NO, NO, NO. PLEASE, PLEASE DON'T. STOP, P-PLEASE.
translation.zh: 请你别打了

translation.en: IT'S TIME YOU DID SOME EXPLAINING, MR. KIRBY.
translation.zh: 你最好给我个解释

translation.en: WE CALLED EVERYONE. WE DID EVERYTHING WE COULD. NO ONE WOULD HELP US.
translation.zh: 我们求过所有的人 试过所有办法 根本没用

translation.en: THE COSTA RICAN GOVERNMENT SAID THIS IS A NO-FLY ZONE.
translation.zh: 哥斯达黎加政府说这里是禁止飞行区

translation.en: THE U.S. EMBASSY-- THAT'S OUR U.S. EMBASSY--
translation.zh: 美国大使馆… 我们自己的大使馆 居然叫我们接受事实！

translation.en: TOLD US WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE INEVITABLE. CAN YOU BELIEVE THAT?
translation.zh: 我们自己的大使馆 居然叫我们接受事实！

translation.en: YOU LET A 12-YEAR-OLD GO PARASAILING ALONE? NO!
translation.zh: 你怎能让12岁小孩单独飞拖曳伞？ 不是！

translation.en: - HE WASN'T ALONE. - BEN HILDEBRAND. HE WAS WITH A FRIEND OF MINE.
translation.zh: 他和我朋友一起飞的 他的名字是宾

translation.en: PAUL AND I DIVORCED OVER A YEAR AGO.
translation.zh: 我和保罗一年前离婚了

translation.en: -SO WHY ME? -HE SAID WE NEEDED SOMEONE WHO'D BEEN ON THE ISLAND BEFORE.
translation.zh: 为什么找我？ 他说需要找曾到过岛上的人

translation.en: YES, BUT I DID NOT TELL YOU TO KIDNAP SOMEBODY.
translation.zh: 可是我没叫你去绑架呀

translation.en: I HAVE NEVER BEEN ON THIS ISLAND.
translation.zh: 我没来过这座岛

translation.en: SURE YOU HAVE. YOU WROTE THAT BOOK.
translation.zh: 你书都写了 怎么会没有？

translation.en: THAT WAS ISLA NUBLAR. THIS IS ISLA SORNA, SITE "B."
translation.zh: 那是努布拉岛 这是索拿岛 B地

translation.en: - YOU MEAN THERE ARE - YOU STAY OUT OF THIS! TWO ISLANDS WITH DINOSAURS?
translation.zh: 有两个不同的恐龙岛？ 好了 没你的事

translation.en: SO HOW LONG HAVE THEY BEEN MISSING?
translation.zh: 他们失踪多久了？

translation.en: EIGHT WEEKS. ALMOST EIGHT WEEKS NOW.
translation.zh: 八个星期 将近八个星期

translation.en: BILLY.
translation.zh: 比利 我们到飞机里尽量多拿点东西

translation.en: WE GO BACK TO THE PLANE AND SALVAGE WHAT WE CAN, THEN WE MAKE FOR THE COAST.
translation.zh: 比利 我们到飞机里尽量多拿点东西 然后就朝海边走

translation.en: DR. GRANT, WE'RE NOT LEAVING THIS ISLAND WITHOUT OUR SON.
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 找不到我儿子我们绝不离开

translation.en: THEN YOU CAN GO AND LOOK FOR HIM...
translation.zh: 你可以自己去找

translation.en: OR YOU CAN STICK WITH US AS LONG AS YOU DON'T HOLD US UP.
translation.zh: 否则就跟着我们 不准生事

translation.en: EITHER WAY... YOU PROBABLY WON'T GET OFF THIS ISLAND ALIVE.
translation.zh: 到头来…恐怕还是死路一条

translation.en: SO... WHAT DO WE DO?
translation.zh: 我们现在怎么办？

translation.en: WE SEARCH FOR YOUR SON... IN THE DIRECTION THAT THEY'RE GOING.
translation.zh: 仍旧去寻找你儿子 但和他们走同一个方向

translation.en: EXCELLENT. EXCELLENT.
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: OH, SORRY. SORRY.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: IT'S NOTHING YOU HAVEN'T SEEN BEFORE, PAUL.
translation.zh: 又不是没看过

translation.en: HOW MUCH WEIGHT DID YOU SAY YOU LOST? ABOUT 25 POUNDS.
translation.zh: 你瘦了多少？ 大约25磅 因为我常游泳

translation.en: I'VE BEEN SWIMMING.
translation.zh: 大约25磅 因为我常游泳

translation.en: SWIMMING? YOU HATE TO SWIM. YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW HOW TO SWIM.
translation.zh: 你讨厌游泳 而且根本不会游

translation.en: I KNOW. I LEARNED.
translation.zh: 我是特别去学的

translation.en: YOU LOOK GOOD. SO DO YOU.
translation.zh: -你看起来很棒 -你也是

translation.en: WELL, IT'S A SUPERPREDATOR. HOW WOULD YOU CLASSIFY IT, BILLY?
translation.zh: 该怎么归类？ 应该是超级肉食性恐龙

translation.en: SUCHIMIMUS. SNOUT.
translation.zh: 鼻子长长的

translation.en: NO, THINK BIGGER.
translation.zh: 还要再大些

translation.en: BARYONYX? NOT WITH THAT SAIL.
translation.zh: 难道是重爪龙？ 重爪龙没有鳍

translation.en: SPINOSAURUS AEGYPTICUS.
translation.zh: 是棘背龙

translation.en: I DON'T REMEMBER THAT ON INGEN'S LIST.
translation.zh: 但它并不在遗传国际公司的目录内

translation.en: IT WASN'T ON THEIR LIST, AND THAT MAKES ME WONDER WHAT ELSE THEY WERE UP TO.
translation.zh: 既然不在目录内 他们可能还搞了其他名堂

translation.en: SO, MR. KIRBY, WHEN YOU CLIMBED K2,
translation.zh: 保罗 告诉我 当你攀登喀喇昆仑山时 基地是设在两万五还是三万尺

translation.en: DID YOU BASE CAMP AT 25 OR 30,000 FEET?
translation.zh: 当你攀登喀喇昆仑山时 基地是设在两万五还是三万尺

translation.en: THIRTY THOUSAND FEET. WE WERE CLOSE TO THE TOP.
translation.zh: 三万尺 非常接近山顶 那比实际山高还超出一千尺

translation.en: YOU WERE ABOUT A THOUSAND FEET ABOVE IT, ACTUALLY.
translation.zh: 那比实际山高还超出一千尺

translation.en: MR. KIRBY. NO, NO, THAT'S A COMMON MISTAKE.
translation.zh: 这是很常见的错误 根本就没有克比企业 是不是？

translation.en: THERE'S NO SUCH THING AS KIRBY ENTERPRISES, IS THERE?
translation.zh: 根本就没有克比企业 是不是？

translation.en: IT'S KIRBY PAINT AND TILE PLUS.
translation.zh: 是克比油漆地砖及其它

translation.en: THE PLUS STANDS FOR BATHROOM FIXTURES.
translation.zh: 所谓其它是指浴室设备

translation.en: WE'RE IN THE WESTGATE SHOPPING CENTER, ENID, OKLAHOMA.
translation.zh: 我们是在俄克拉荷马州的 西门购物中心内…

translation.en: SO I DON'T SUPPOSE THAT CHECK YOU WROTE US IS ANY GOOD.
translation.zh: 看来那张支票也不能兑现

translation.en: [ Paul ] I WILL PAY YOU, NO MATTER WHAT. THIS IS GOOD. THIS IS GOOD.
translation.zh: -我一定会付你的… -你把我们整死了

translation.en: HERE WE ARE IN THE WORST PLACE IN THE WORLD, AND WE'RE NOT EVEN BEING PAID.
translation.zh: 我们身处绝境 居然还被耍

translation.en: NOW, WAIT, FELLAS. HOLD ON. I'LL MAKE THIS UP TO YOU.
translation.zh: 你们别生气 这样好了

translation.en: IF YOU EVER DO A BATHROOM OR A KITCHEN--
translation.zh: 将来你想装修浴室或厨房…

translation.en: YOU'RE NOT REALLY A MERCENARY, ARE YOU?
translation.zh: 你也不是什么雇佣兵吧？

translation.en: I NEVER SAID I WAS. THAT'S TRUE.
translation.zh: 我从没这么说过 那也对

translation.en: WELL, I'M LIKE A BOOKING AGENT. WHAT ARE YOU?
translation.zh: 那你是干什么的？ 我是中介人

translation.en: ONE OF THE GUYS GOT SICK AND COULDN'T COME.
translation.zh: 有个人生病不能来…

translation.en: EXCUSE ME. HERE.
translation.zh: -借过 -让我来

translation.en: SO YOU RUN A HARDWARE STORE?
translation.zh: 你开五金店？

translation.en: HMM. PAINT AND TILE. YEAH.
translation.zh: 是油漆和地砖

translation.en: YOU NEVER CAN TELL ABOUT PEOPLE, CAN YOU? AIN'T THAT THE TRUTH?
translation.zh: 人不可貌相 我同意

translation.en: QUIET. ERIC?
translation.zh: -艾瑞克 -不要叫

translation.en: WOULD YOU STOP THAT? DR. GRANT SAYS THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS TERRITORY.
translation.zh: 你别叫 格兰特博士说这里很危险

translation.en: MAYBE WE SHOULD SPLIT UP OR SOMETHING. WE COULD COVER TWICE AS MUCH GROUND.
translation.zh: 我们应该分两路 才能找更多的地方

translation.en: "DR. GRANT SAYS--" DR. GRANT SAYS THAT'S A BAD IDEA.
translation.zh: 格兰特博士说那样不好 又是格兰特博士说…

translation.en: WHAT'S THE GOOD OF HIRING AN EXPERT IF WE'RE NOT GONNA USE HIS ADVICE?
translation.zh: 既然雇了专家 为什么不听他的话？

translation.en: YEAH, EXCEPT DR. GRANT ISN'T LOOKING FOR ERIC. HE'S LOOKING FOR THE COAST.
translation.zh: 可惜他不找艾瑞克 而是找海边

translation.en: OKAY, FINE. GO AHEAD AND SCREAM.
translation.zh: 那你就去喊

translation.en: THEN WHEN THAT TRICYCLOPLOTS ATTACKS YOU, DON'T COME CRYING TO ME.
translation.zh: 等那只三什么龙攻击你时 别哭着来找我

translation.en: DON'T WORRY ABOUT THAT. WHAT?
translation.zh: -不用你费心 -什么？

translation.en: NOTHING. NEVER MIND. WHAT DID YOU SAY?
translation.zh: -没什么 -你说什么？

translation.en: WHAT DID YOU SAY? GOD, PAUL, JUST DROP IT.
translation.zh: -没什么 -你说什么？ 天呀 别啰嗦了

translation.en: IF WE SPLIT UP, I'M GOING WITH YOU GUYS.
translation.zh: 如果分开走 我要和你们一组

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY-- [ Amanda, Paul ] ERIC!
translation.zh: -艾瑞克！ -艾瑞克！

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY! ERIC!
translation.zh: -克比太太… -艾瑞克！ 克比太太！

translation.en: MRS. KIRBY, THE CHANCES ARE REMOTE THEY'RE STILL IN THE VICINITY.
translation.zh: 他们还在附近的可能性很低

translation.en: YOUNG ADULT.
translation.zh: 是艾瑞克的

translation.en: [ Udesky ] HEY, GUYS.
translation.zh: 喂 你们看

translation.en: THAT'S MY CAMERA. WAIT.
translation.zh: 那是我的摄影机 等等

translation.en: I GOT AN IDEA. THE BATTERY'S DEAD.
translation.zh: 电池没了 我有个主意

translation.en: LET ME HAVE THE CAMERA.
translation.zh: 摄影机给我

translation.en: [ Eric Over Video Camera ] WHERE WERE YOU ON THAT ONE, MA?
translation.zh: 妈 你在哪里？

translation.en: [ Ben Over Video Camera ] OKAY, DIVE, DIVE. OKAY, DIVING.
translation.zh: -好 俯冲　　 -俯冲

translation.en: [ Amanda Over Video Camera ] YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO CATCH IT. COME ON, MA!
translation.zh: 老妈 你应该接住

translation.en: [ Video Camera Continues ] I SHOT THIS THE MORNING THEY DISAPPEARED.
translation.zh: 老妈 你应该接住 这是他失踪那天的早上拍的

translation.en: NO, I WANT THAT. LET ME TAKE THAT. COME ON, GIVE ME THAT.
translation.zh: 给我 让我拿 给我嘛

translation.en: [ Ben ] NO, NOT YET. [ Eric ] SEE ANYTHING YET?
translation.zh: 有没有看到什么？ 还没有

translation.en: [ Eric ] WHAT WAS THAT?
translation.zh: 还没有 那是什么？

translation.en: [ Ben ] UNCLIP US. THERE'S A BIG CLIP. I CAN'T SEE.
translation.zh: -把夹子打开 还有个大钩子 -我看不到

translation.en: I CAN'T DO IT.
translation.zh: 我没办法

translation.en: I'M GONNA UNHOOK YOU, ALL RIGHT?
translation.zh: 我先把你松开

translation.en: ONE, TWO, THREE.
translation.zh: 一、二、三

translation.en: OKAY, BUDDY? I'M GONNA DROP MYSELF DOWN NOW.
translation.zh: 好 我现在下来

translation.en: THE CAMERA'S STILL ON. [ Pushes Button ]
translation.zh: 摄影机还在拍

translation.en: HE'S ALIVE. I KNOW HE'S ALIVE.
translation.zh: 他还活着 我就知道他还活着

translation.en: WE'RE GONNA FIND HIM.
translation.zh: 我们得去找他

translation.en: CAN YOU FLY ONE OF THOSE?
translation.zh: 你能飞那家伙吗？

translation.en: MAYBE, AS LONG AS THE SAIL'S NOT TORN.
translation.zh: 只要伞没坏 应该可以

translation.en: WELL, LET'S TAKE IT.
translation.zh: 那把它拿下来

translation.en: IF WE SPOT A PLANE, IT MIGHT BE A GOOD WAY TO GET ATTENTION.
translation.zh: 如果有飞机经过 这该能引起驾驶员的注意

translation.en: PULL IT OVER THIS WAY.
translation.zh: 向这边拉

translation.en: I'LL GET IT. I'LL GET IT. OKAY, OKAY.
translation.zh: 我拿开了 你没事了

translation.en: - GET HER BACK, MR. KIRBY. - AMANDA!
translation.zh: 保罗 把她追回来

translation.en: WAIT! [ Screaming ]
translation.zh: 阿曼达 等等

translation.en: AMANDA?
translation.zh: 阿曼达

translation.en: AMANDA. AMANDA. AMANDA, STOP, STOP, STOP.
translation.zh: 阿曼达 你停下来

translation.en: I'M SORRY. I'M SORRY ABOUT BEN.
translation.zh: 宾的事我很抱歉

translation.en: IT'S NOT BEN, PAUL. IT'S ERIC.
translation.zh: 这和宾无关 是艾瑞克

translation.en: HE'S OUT THERE ALL BY HIMSELF.
translation.zh: 他孤身一人在这岛上

translation.en: I KNOW, I KNOW.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: OUR BABY'S OUT HERE ALL BY HIMSELF.
translation.zh: 我们的孩子一个人在这里

translation.en: LISTEN TO ME. WE'LL FIND HIM. I PROMISE.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 我们一定会找到他

translation.en: [ Whispers ] PAUL.
translation.zh: 保罗

translation.en: [ Paul ] DR. GRANT! YOU SHOULD COME LOOK AT THIS!
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 你快来看

translation.en: [ Quietly ] RAPTOR!
translation.zh: 快盗龙

translation.en: WE'RE GONNA FIND HIM. YOU LISTENING TO ME? WE'RE GONNA FIND HIM.
translation.zh: 你听着 我们一定会找到他

translation.en: THE KID'S GOT RESOURCES. REMEMBER WHAT IT WAS LIKE TO TRY TO GROUND HIM?
translation.zh: 这孩子有小聪明 记得以前我们罚他禁足 他却花招百出吗？

translation.en: WHERE'S BILLY?
translation.zh: 比利呢？

translation.en: I WAS PHOTOGRAPHING THE NEST. WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？ 我在拍鸟巢

translation.en: I'M SORRY. DON'T DO THAT AGAIN.
translation.zh: 别再那么做 对不起

translation.en: IF WE LOSE YOU, IT'S JUST ME AND THE DAMN TOURISTS.
translation.zh: 如果失去你 叫我怎么和那些人相处

translation.en: [ Paul ] I BET YOU ERIC'S IN THERE.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克一定在那里

translation.en: DON'T YOU THINK? I'D BET MY BOTTOM DOLLAR.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克一定在那里 我赌最后一块钱

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK IT IS?
translation.zh: 你说呢？

translation.en: AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, IT'S THE FOUR SEASONS.
translation.zh: 对我来说它是五星级酒店

translation.en: ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克！

translation.en: [ Quietly ] PAUL, DON'T!
translation.zh: 保罗！别叫！

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL?
translation.zh: 赌个运气吧

translation.en: WHO'S GOT SOME CHANGE? IT ONLY TAKES QUARTERS.
translation.zh: 谁能换零钱？它只收25美分的硬币

translation.en: I GOT, LIKE-- I GOT A BUCK TEN.
translation.zh: 谁能换零钱？它只收25美分的硬币 我只有1美元和10美分的

translation.en: THIS IS HOW YOU MAKE DINOSAURS?
translation.zh: 这就是你们制造恐龙的方式？

translation.en: NO. THIS IS HOW YOU PLAY GOD.
translation.zh: 不 这是扮演上帝的方式

translation.en: THIS WAY! THIS WAY!
translation.zh: 这边！

translation.en: IT'S LOCKED!
translation.zh: 锁住了

translation.en: THIS WAY! THIS WAY! GO! GO!
translation.zh: -来这边 -快！

translation.en: HEY! OVER HERE! HEY! OVER HERE!
translation.zh: 喂！这里！

translation.en: PUSH! [ Shouting ]
translation.zh: 推！

translation.en: [ Cawing Continues ] MY GOD.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: - [ Cawing ] - HE'S CALLING FOR HELP.
translation.zh: 它在向同伴求救

translation.en: [ Cawing Continues ] COME ON!
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: HEAD TO THE HERD!
translation.zh: 朝草食龙群里跑

translation.en: HEAD FOR THE TREES!
translation.zh: 到树上去

translation.en: [ Screaming ] UDESKY.
translation.zh: 余戴斯？

translation.en: [ Billy ] MR. KIRBY?
translation.zh: 克比先生？

translation.en: - BILLY? - IS ALAN WITH YOU?
translation.zh: 比利？ 阿伦和你在一起吗？

translation.en: MR. UDESKY? OH, MY GOD.
translation.zh: 天啊！ 余戴斯？

translation.en: MR. UDESKY?
translation.zh: 余戴斯？

translation.en: HE'S DEAD.
translation.zh: 他死了

translation.en: OH, MY GOD, NO, HE'S NOT!
translation.zh: 不 他没死

translation.en: - NO, WAIT! - WE GOTTA HELP HIM. SOMETHING'S NOT RIGHT.
translation.zh: 等一下 似乎不对劲 我们得去帮他

translation.en: [ Paul ] AMANDA!
translation.zh: 阿曼达

translation.en: - HOLD ON! - [ Screams ]
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: THEY SET A TRAP. THEY ACTUALLY SET A TRAP.
translation.zh: 圈套 它们居然设下圈套

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU SAYING?
translation.zh: 你们在说什么？

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING FOR?
translation.zh: 你们在找什么？

translation.en: WAIT!
translation.zh: 等一等

translation.en: THANKS.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: THANKS A LOT, ERIC.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克 真谢谢你

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHO I AM? YEAH.
translation.zh: 你知道我是谁？ 是的 你父母也到这里来找你了

translation.en: YOUR PARENTS ARE HERE. THEY'RE LOOKING FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 是的 你父母也到这里来找你了

translation.en: TOGETHER?
translation.zh: 一起？

translation.en: TOGETHER.
translation.zh: 对 一起

translation.en: THAT'S NOT GOOD. THEY DON'T DO SO WELL TOGETHER.
translation.zh: 不好 他们在一起就吵架

translation.en: YOU'D BE SURPRISED WHAT PEOPLE CAN DO WHEN THEY HAVE TO.
translation.zh: 为了找你 他们相处得还不错

translation.en: YOU'RE ALAN GRANT.
translation.zh: 你是阿伦格兰特

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
translation.zh: 你来这儿干什么？

translation.en: YOUR PARENTS, UH,
translation.zh: 你父母…

translation.en: INVITED ME ALONG.
translation.zh: 邀我一起来

translation.en: I READ BOTH OF YOUR BOOKS.
translation.zh: 你的两本书我都看过

translation.en: I LIKED THE FIRST ONE MORE. BEFORE YOU WERE ON THE ISLAND.
translation.zh: 我喜欢第一本写你在岛上的书

translation.en: YOU LIKED DINOSAURS BACK THEN.
translation.zh: 以前你蛮喜欢恐龙的

translation.en: BACK THEN THEY HADN'T TRIED TO EAT ME YET.
translation.zh: 以前它们并没有要吃我

translation.en: WHEN INGEN CLEARED OUT, THEY LEFT A LOT OF STUFF BEHIND. ANY WEAPONS?
translation.zh: 他们搬走时留下不少东西 -有武器吗？ -没了 我用了最后一个瓦斯弹

translation.en: NO. AND I JUST USED THE LAST OF THE GAS GRENADES.
translation.zh: -有武器吗？ -没了 我用了最后一个瓦斯弹

translation.en: AND I APPRECIATE THAT. [ Coughing ]
translation.zh: 谢谢你救了我

translation.en: BE CAREFUL WITH THAT. T-REX.
translation.zh: 小心一点 那是霸王龙的

translation.en: IT SCARES THE SMALLER ONES, BUT ATTRACTS ONE REALLY BIG ONE WITH A FIN.
translation.zh: 会把小的恐龙吓跑 却会吸引更大的来

translation.en: THIS IS T-REX PEE?
translation.zh: 这是霸王龙的尿？

translation.en: HOW'D YOU GET IT?
translation.zh: 你怎么弄来的？

translation.en: YOU DON'T WANNA KNOW.
translation.zh: 还是不知道的好

translation.en: SURE. DESSERT?
translation.zh: 要甜点吗？ 好

translation.en: ERIC, I HAVE TO TELL YOU, I'M ASTONISHED THAT YOU'VE LASTED EIGHT WEEKS ON THIS ISLAND.
translation.zh: 你能在岛上活八个星期 真的让我很惊讶

translation.en: IS THAT ALL IT'S BEEN?
translation.zh: 才过了八个星期吗？

translation.en: YOU'RE ALIVE, AND THAT'S THE IMPORTANT THING.
translation.zh: 活着是最重要的

translation.en: AND THANKS TO YOU, THAT'S ONE THING THAT WE HAVE IN COMMON.
translation.zh: 幸好有你 否则我必死无疑

translation.en: DID YOU READ MALCOLM'S BOOK?
translation.zh: 你看过马博士的书吗？

translation.en: YEAH.
translation.zh: 看过

translation.en: SO?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: I-I DON'T KNOW. I MEAN, IT WAS KIND OF PREACHY.
translation.zh: 我觉得很唠叨 而且乱成一团

translation.en: AND TOO MUCH CHAOS. EVERYTHING'S CHAOS.
translation.zh: 而且乱成一团

translation.en: IT SEEMED LIKE THE GUY WAS KIND OF HIGH ON HIMSELF.
translation.zh: 他似乎自以为高人一等

translation.en: THAT'S TWO THINGS THAT WE HAVE IN COMMON.
translation.zh: 我深有同感

translation.en: LISTEN. [ Chittering ]
translation.zh: 你听

translation.en: COMPYS!
translation.zh: 是秀颌龙

translation.en: [ Billy ] ALAN!
translation.zh: 阿伦！

translation.en: ALAN!
translation.zh: 阿伦！

translation.en: ALAN!
translation.zh: 阿伦 你在哪里？

translation.en: NO MATTER HOW THIS TURNS OUT, IT WASN'T YOUR FAULT.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 这不是你的错

translation.en: ERIC'S ALWAYS BEEN A STRONG-WILLED KID.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克是个意志坚强的孩子

translation.en: ALWAYS. THEN YOU THROW SOMEONE LIKE BEN HILDEBRAND INTO THE MIX--
translation.zh: 一直都是这样 后来你把宾给扯进来

translation.en: WELL--
translation.zh: 那是…

translation.en: "WELL" WHAT?
translation.zh: “那是”什么？

translation.en: ALL I'M SAYING-- IT'S NOT YOUR FAULT.
translation.zh: 我只想说这不是你的错

translation.en: NO, IF HE'D BEEN WITH YOU, HE'D BE COMPLETELY SAFE.
translation.zh: 不 如果他和你一起就不会出事

translation.en: YOU DRIVE FIVE MILES UNDER THE SPEED LIMIT, PAUL.
translation.zh: 你开车永远低于最高限速

translation.en: AND I'VE TOTALED THREE CARS IN THREE YEARS.
translation.zh: 而我三年中撞毁了三辆车

translation.en: WELL, NOT THREE. THE BUICK WASN'T REALLY TOTALED.
translation.zh: 不是三辆 别克车并没有全毁

translation.en: I JUST SAID IT WAS 'CAUSE I WANTED TO GET THE S.U.V.
translation.zh: 我说它毁了是因为 我想买新的多功能运动车

translation.en: I AM SO SORRY THAT YOU HAVE TO BE HERE.
translation.zh: 对不起 要你来这里受罪

translation.en: I'M NOT.
translation.zh: 我倒不觉得

translation.en: [ Alan ] YEAH, THERE'S A BOAT RIGHT ALONGSIDE THE BANK.
translation.zh: 在堤岸边有条船

translation.en: LOOKS IN GOOD SHAPE. RESCUE BOAT?
translation.zh: 看起来还能开 是援救船吗？

translation.en: NO, NO. JUST SOMETHING LEFT BEHIND.
translation.zh: 不是 以前留下来的船 至少它能浮起来

translation.en: BUT IT FLOATS.
translation.zh: 以前留下来的船 至少它能浮起来

translation.en: WE STICK TO THE PLAN.
translation.zh: 我们依计行事

translation.en: YOU'RE NOT GONNA LOOK FOR DR. GRANT? HEAD TO THE COAST.
translation.zh: 朝海边出发 你不去找格兰特博士吗？

translation.en: GOING TO THE COAST WAS ALAN'S IDEA. IF HE'S ALIVE, THAT'S WHERE HE'S HEADED.
translation.zh: 到海岸去是他的主意 若他活着 一定会朝那边走

translation.en: I AGREE. WHAT ABOUT ERIC?
translation.zh: 我同意 那艾瑞克呢？

translation.en: ERIC'S A SMART KID. HE PROBABLY KNOWS HE STANDS HIS BEST CHANCE BY THE COAST.
translation.zh: 他很聪明 应该想到海边的机会比较大

translation.en: HE FIGURES ALL THE BIG DINOSAURS ARE IN THE CENTER OF THE ISLAND. RIGHT?
translation.zh: 而且大恐龙都集中在岛中间 是不是？

translation.en: SURE.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: KNOW WHAT THIS IS?
translation.zh: 你知道这是什么？

translation.en: THAT'S A RAPTOR CLAW. USED TO HAVE ONE.
translation.zh: 快盗龙的爪子 我以前也有一个

translation.en: A FOSSIL.
translation.zh: 是化石的

translation.en: MINE IS NEW.
translation.zh: 我的是新鲜的

translation.en: HOW MUCH OF THE ISLAND DID YOU EXPLORE?
translation.zh: 你已经探勘过岛上多少地方了？

translation.en: I STAYED PRETTY CLOSE TO THE COMPOUND.
translation.zh: 我一直留在这附近

translation.en: I FIGURED IF ANYONE CAME LOOKING FOR ME, THAT'S WHERE THEY'D START.
translation.zh: 我想如果有人找我 一定会来这儿

translation.en: WE NEED TO GET TO THE COAST. THAT WAS THE PLAN.
translation.zh: 我们的计划是到海边

translation.en: ARE YOU SURE? CLOSER YOU GET TO THE WATER, THE BIGGER THINGS GET.
translation.zh: 你确定？离水越近恐龙越大

translation.en: WELL, IF WE CAN FIND OUR WAY DOWN INTO THE CANYON,
translation.zh: 如果能下到峡谷

translation.en: WE COULD FOLLOW THE RIVER OUT TO THE COAST.
translation.zh: 就能沿着河到海边

translation.en: AFTER WE FIND YOUR PARENTS.
translation.zh: 先去找你的父母

translation.en: AND THEN WHAT? ONE STEP AT A TIME.
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: LISTEN.
translation.zh: 一步一步来 你听

translation.en: WHAT?
translation.zh: 听什么？

translation.en: THAT'S MY DAD'S SATELLITE PHONE! [ Cell Phone Ringing ]
translation.zh: 那是我老爸的卫星电话

translation.en: WAIT A MINUTE! HOW DO YOU KNOW?
translation.zh: 等一下 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: KIRBY PAINT AND TILE PLUS, IN WESTGATE! DAD!
translation.zh: 西门中心的克比油漆和地砖 爸爸

translation.en: MOM!
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: ERIC! ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克

translation.en: ERIC! THIS WAY! ERIC! ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克 走这边

translation.en: MOM! DAD!
translation.zh: 妈妈、爸爸！

translation.en: MOM! ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克

translation.en: MOM! DAD! MOM! DAD!
translation.zh: 妈妈、爸爸！

translation.en: I KNEW IT! MY GOD! I KNEW IT.
translation.zh: 我就知道能找到你

translation.en: - OH, MY GOD. - AM I GLAD TO SEE YOU.
translation.zh: 真高兴看到你

translation.en: HEY, YOU GOT MY BAG.
translation.zh: 你拣到了我的袋子

translation.en: YEAH. LUCKY STRAP.
translation.zh: 有幸运的背带啊

translation.en: - WANT ME TO CARRY IT? - WE NEED TO FIND A GAP HERE.
translation.zh: 让我拿好了 我们需要找个缺口

translation.en: -HOW DID YOU KNOW WE WERE HERE? -THE PHONE. THAT STUPID JINGLE FROM THE STORE, I HEARD IT.
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我们在这里？ 我听到电话铃响

translation.en: YEAH, YOUR SATELLITE PHONE. WHERE IS IT? MY PHONE?
translation.zh: 我的电话？ 就是你的卫星电话 在哪里？

translation.en: - I DON'T HAVE IT. - WHEN DID YOU USE IT LAST?
translation.zh: 我没有呀 你最后一次用它是在哪里？

translation.en: UH, UH, ON THE PLANE.
translation.zh: 飞机上

translation.en: I GOT A CALL ON THE PLANE, AND-- WHAT?
translation.zh: 在飞机上我接了一通电话… 后来呢？

translation.en: WHAT! I LOANED IT TO NASH.
translation.zh: -怎么啦？ -我借给了奈许

translation.en: HE MUST'VE HAD IT WHEN HE--
translation.zh: 难道说当他…

translation.en: RUN.
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: ALAN, YOU WANNA GIVE ME THE BAG BACK?
translation.zh: 把袋子给我吧

translation.en: THAT'S OKAY, BILLY, I GOT IT.
translation.zh: 我拿着没关系

translation.en: PLEASE GIVE ME THE BAG.
translation.zh: 请你还给我

translation.en: IT'S NOT SAFE.
translation.zh: 它不安全

translation.en: RAPTOR EGGS.
translation.zh: 快盗龙的蛋

translation.en: DID YOU STEAL RAPTOR EGGS?
translation.zh: 你偷了快盗龙的蛋？

translation.en: NOW IT ALL MAKES SENSE. [ Billy ] I SWEAR...
translation.zh: 我终于明白了 我发誓 当初没想到 你会捡到我的袋子…

translation.en: IF I'D KNOWN THAT YOU WERE GONNA END UP WITH THEM--
translation.zh: 我发誓 当初没想到 你会捡到我的袋子…

translation.en: I TOOK 'EM ON AN IMPULSE. I THOUGHT THEY'D BE WORTH A FORTUNE,
translation.zh: 我真的是一时冲动

translation.en: ENOUGH TO FUND THE DIG SITE ANOTHER TEN MORE YEARS.
translation.zh: 只想到它价值高 至少能换得十年的研究基金

translation.en: LOOK, YOU HAVE TO BELIEVE ME. THIS WAS A STUPID DECISION.
translation.zh: 请你相信我 我知道这样做很愚蠢

translation.en: BUT I DID IT WITH THE BEST INTENTIONS.
translation.zh: 但我是全出自于一片好意

translation.en: WITH THE BEST INTENTIONS.
translation.zh: 出自一片好意

translation.en: SOME OF THE WORST THINGS IMAGINABLE ARE BEING DONE... WITH THE BEST INTENTIONS.
translation.zh: 许多最坏的情况就是出自一片好意

translation.en: BILLY, AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED,
translation.zh: 比利 依我看

translation.en: YOU'RE NO BETTER THAN THE PEOPLE THAT BUILT THIS PLACE.
translation.zh: 你和建这个岛的人一样糟

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU DOING? THOSE THINGS ARE AFTER US BECAUSE OF THOSE.
translation.zh: 你想干什么？ 那些家伙就是为了蛋才追我们

translation.en: "THOSE THINGS" KNOW WE HAVE THE EGGS.
translation.zh: “那些家伙”知道我们有蛋

translation.en: I DROP THEM IN THE RIVER, THEY'LL STILL BE AFTER US.
translation.zh: 就算丢到河里去 它们仍会追我们

translation.en: WHAT IF THEY CATCH US WITH 'EM?
translation.zh: 若抓到我们和蛋呢？

translation.en: WHAT IF THEY CATCH US WITHOUT 'EM?
translation.zh: 若抓到我们没有蛋呢？

translation.en: [ Alan ] THERE'S A BOAT AT THE BOTTOM, JUST DOWNRIVER.
translation.zh: 在下游处有条船 我们尽量逃到海边去

translation.en: WE CAN TRY AND MAKE IT TO THE COAST, AT LEAST.
translation.zh: 我们尽量逃到海边去

translation.en: YEAH. [ Whistles ] YOU OKAY?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: LET'S DO THIS ONE AT A TIME, SHALL WE?
translation.zh: 一次先过一个人

translation.en: OKAY, COME ON OVER!
translation.zh: 好 过来

translation.en: ONE AT A TIME!
translation.zh: 一次一个人

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, ERIC, I'M GONNA LEAVE YOU JUST FOR A MINUTE, OKAY?
translation.zh: 好 艾瑞克 我离开你一下

translation.en: THEN YOU'RE GONNA BE RIGHT BEHIND ME, OKAY?
translation.zh: 你就在我后面

translation.en: MOM, I'VE BEEN ALONE IN A WATER TRUCK FOR EIGHT WEEKS.
translation.zh: 妈 我一个人待在给水车里八个礼拜

translation.en: I THINK I CAN MANAGE THE NEXT TWO MINUTES WITHOUT YOU.
translation.zh: 两分钟没有你 不会有问题

translation.en: ALL RIGHT. WE'RE ALL TOGETHER NOW.
translation.zh: 对 我们已经团圆了

translation.en: OKAY, ERIC!
translation.zh: 好了 艾瑞克

translation.en: OKAY. OVER YOU GO. COME ON, HONEY.
translation.zh: 过来吧 你去吧

translation.en: MOM?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: OH, MY GOD.
translation.zh: 喔 糟糕

translation.en: WHAT IS IT? IT'S A BIRDCAGE.
translation.zh: 怎么啦？ 这是个鸟笼

translation.en: FOR WHAT?
translation.zh: 什么鸟的笼子？

translation.en: - [ Screaming ] - ERIC!
translation.zh: 爸爸！ 艾瑞克？

translation.en: ERIC. ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克？ 艾瑞克！ 救命呀！

translation.en: HELP ME!
translation.zh: 救命呀！

translation.en: ERIC! ERIC.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克！

translation.en: ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克

translation.en: I CAN'T SEE HIM! I CAN'T SEE HIM!
translation.zh: 我看不到他！

translation.en: ERIC! ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克

translation.en: - [ Babies Screeching ] - NO, NO!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: THIS WAY!
translation.zh: 这边！

translation.en: BILLY? BILLY?
translation.zh: 比利

translation.en: BILLY, STOP. BILLY, STOP! DON'T, BILLY!
translation.zh: 停下来 比利 不要！

translation.en: BILLY!
translation.zh: 比利！

translation.en: ERIC, HOLD ON!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克 坚持下去

translation.en: ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克

translation.en: JUMP!
translation.zh: 跳过来

translation.en: BILLY!
translation.zh: 比利

translation.en: LET GO NOW!
translation.zh: 你先下去！

translation.en: ERIC? HE'S THERE.
translation.zh: -艾瑞克？ -他在那里

translation.en: ERIC? ERIC!
translation.zh: 艾瑞克！

translation.en: THERE HE IS! HE'S ACROSS THE RIVER!
translation.zh: 他在那儿 在河那边

translation.en: GET HIM OUTTA HERE!
translation.zh: 把他带走

translation.en: NO, NO. WHAT ABOUT BILLY? GO, ERIC.
translation.zh: -我们走 -比利怎么办？

translation.en: - HANG ON, BILLY! - [ Screeching ]
translation.zh: 撑下去！

translation.en: WAIT. BILLY!
translation.zh: 别去

translation.en: [ Gasping ] GET AWAY.
translation.zh: 你们走开！

translation.en: - GET AWAY! - [ Screeching ]
translation.zh: 快走开

translation.en: THERE'S PLENTY OF GASOLINE.
translation.zh: 我们有足够的汽油

translation.en: NOW WE JUST GOTTA MAKE OUR WAY TO THE COAST.
translation.zh: 只要能到海边就好了

translation.en: WORK OUT SOME SORT OF A SIGNAL.
translation.zh: 我们可以发出信号…

translation.en: BUILD A FIRE OR SOMETHING. SOMETHING THEY CAN SEE FROM THE AIR.
translation.zh: 生火或什么的 好让他们能看到

translation.en: DR. GRANT?
translation.zh: 格兰特博士

translation.en: HEY, ERIC, HOW YOU DOING?
translation.zh: 嗨 你怎么样？

translation.en: I'M SORRY ABOUT BILLY.
translation.zh: 失去比利你一定很难过

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT THE LAST THING I SAID TO HIM WAS?
translation.zh: 你知道我对他说的最后一句话吗？

translation.en: I SAID, "YOU'RE AS BAD AS THE PEOPLE THAT BUILT THIS PLACE."
translation.zh: 我说… “你和建这个岛的人一样糟”

translation.en: WHICH WASN'T TRUE. BILLY WAS JUST YOUNG.
translation.zh: 那只是气话 他太年轻气盛

translation.en: THAT'S ALL.
translation.zh: 如此而已

translation.en: I HAVE A THEORY THAT THERE ARE TWO KINDS OF BOYS.
translation.zh: 我认为男孩可分两类

translation.en: THERE ARE THOSE THAT WANT TO BE ASTRONOMERS,
translation.zh: 一类想成为天文学家

translation.en: AND THOSE THAT WANT TO BE ASTRONAUTS.
translation.zh: 一类想做太空人

translation.en: THE ASTRONOMER, OR THE PALEONTOLOGIST, GETS TO--
translation.zh: 天文学家… 和古生物学家一样

translation.en: GETS TO STUDY THESE AMAZING THINGS FROM A PLACE OF COMPLETE SAFETY.
translation.zh: 在完全安全的地方做研究

translation.en: EXACTLY. BUT THEN YOU NEVER GET TO GO INTO SPACE.
translation.zh: 可惜永远不能上太空 没错 差别就在想象和亲眼所见

translation.en: THAT'S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN IMAGINING AND SEEING:
translation.zh: 没错 差别就在想象和亲眼所见

translation.en: TO BE ABLE TO TOUCH THEM.
translation.zh: 并能亲手摸到它们

translation.en: AND THAT'S... THAT'S ALL THAT BILLY WANTED.
translation.zh: 那也是比利最渴望的

translation.en: DR. GRANT.
translation.zh: 格兰特博士

translation.en: KNOW SOMETHING, DR. GRANT?
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 你知道吗？

translation.en: BILLY WAS RIGHT.
translation.zh: 比利是对的

translation.en: [ Cell Phone Ringing ] LISTEN!
translation.zh: 你们听

translation.en: - FIND IT - ERIC, YOU STAY ON THAT BOAT. BEFORE IT STOPS RINGING!
translation.zh: 在挂断前快找到它 艾瑞克 你留在船上

translation.en: IT'S HERE. WAIT. WHOA-WHOA, IT'S HERE.
translation.zh: 在这里 不对 是这里

translation.en: HELLO? HELLO!
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [ Man ] YOU TOO CAN OWN A TIME-SHARE IN BEAUTIFUL GUADALAJARA.
translation.zh: 你可拥有位于瓜达拉哈市的 度假别墅的共同所有权 并在我们的四星级餐厅用餐

translation.en: ENJOY A MEAL IN ONE OF OUR FOUR-STAR RESTAURANTS-- LOOK OUT!
translation.zh: 并在我们的四星级餐厅用餐 小心！

translation.en: TURN UP THE POWER. YOU'VE GOT JUICE FOR MAYBE ONE CALL.
translation.zh: 剩下来的电池只够我们打一通电话

translation.en: WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T CALL THE U.S. EMBASSY. THEY WON'T DO A DAMN THING.
translation.zh: 千万别打给美国大使馆 他们屁事不做

translation.en: HEY, GUYS! COME HERE! LOOK AT THIS!
translation.zh: 你们过来看呀！

translation.en: SOMETHING MUST HAVE SPOOKED THEM. BONITOS.
translation.zh: 鲣鱼 它们被吓坏了

translation.en: GET THE ENGINE GOING, MR. KIRBY.
translation.zh: 保罗 别让引擎停下来

translation.en: OPEN THE THROTTLE.
translation.zh: 把节流阀打开

translation.en: [ Phone Ringing ] PICK UP, PICK UP.
translation.zh: 接电话

translation.en: HELLO?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: - ELLIE? - HELLO?
translation.zh: 艾丽吗？ 喂？

translation.en: HELLO? CHARLIE! CHARLIE!
translation.zh: 查理！ 喂？

translation.en: CHARLIE, TAKE THE PHONE TO MOMMY NOW.
translation.zh: 查理 把电话拿给妈咪

translation.en: TAKE THE PHONE TO MOMMY. IT'S THE DINOSAUR MAN.
translation.zh: 快把电话拿给妈咪 是恐龙先生打来的

translation.en: LISTEN TO ME, CHARLIE. OKAY.
translation.zh: 好 听我说…

translation.en: CHARLIE, ARE YOU TAKING THE PHONE TO MOM?
translation.zh: 查理 有没有把电话给妈咪？

translation.en: CHARLIE!
translation.zh: 查理？

translation.en: [ Barney On TV ] OH, HO-HO. HI, EVERYBODY!
translation.zh: 哈、哈、哈 大家好

translation.en: IT'S GREAT TO BE HERE! HI, THERE! HOW ARE YOU TODAY?
translation.zh: 这里真不错 你们好吗？

translation.en: [ Barney ] THIS IS GONNA BE GREAT!
translation.zh: 一定会很棒的

translation.en: THE DINOSAUR MAN. WHO'S ON THE PHONE?
translation.zh: -谁打来的？ -恐龙先生

translation.en: HE IS? ALAN?
translation.zh: 是吗？阿伦？

translation.en: LOOK IN THE BOXES! FIND A WEAPON!
translation.zh: 找找看盒子里有没有武器

translation.en: - [ Ringing ] - WHERE'S THE PHONE? - THERE! - GET THE PHONE!
translation.zh: 电话呢？快去接

translation.en: ELLIE? ELLIE, LISTEN TO ME.
translation.zh: 艾丽 听我说！

translation.en: ALAN, ARE YOU ON A CELL PHONE? I CAN'T HEAR YOU?
translation.zh: 你用手机吗？我听不到

translation.en: THE RIVER! SITE "B"! THE RIVER!
translation.zh: B地的河流！

translation.en: HELLO? [ Phone Beeping ]
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: DAD! DAD!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: - [ Screams ] - PAUL!
translation.zh: 保罗！

translation.en: DAD!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: PAUL, YOU JERK!
translation.zh: 保罗 你这个混蛋

translation.en: YOU CAN'T LEAVE ME LIKE THIS!
translation.zh: 你怎么能就这样走了？

translation.en: I'M NOT GOING ANYWHERE.
translation.zh: 我没走呀

translation.en: REMEMBER WHEN WE WENT FISHING A COUPLE SUMMERS AGO?
translation.zh: 还记得几年前的夏天 我们去钓鱼吗？

translation.en: I WAS PUTTING THE BOAT IN THE WATER, AND THE TRAILER SANK?
translation.zh: 当我把船卸下来时 拖车反而沉了

translation.en: THE TOW TRUCK TRIED TO PULL US OUT, AND IT GOT DRAGGED IN TOO.
translation.zh: 拖吊车想把车拉上来 自己反而越陷越深

translation.en: THE TRUCK DRIVER WANTED TO KNOCK MY LIGHTS OUT.
translation.zh: 气得司机差点揍我一顿

translation.en: I MISS FISHING.
translation.zh: 我真想念钓鱼

translation.en: [ Alan ] MR. KIRBY?
translation.zh: 保罗

translation.en: HMM? THAT LADY YOU CALLED.
translation.zh: 你找的那位女士…她是谁？

translation.en: WHO IS SHE? HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT SHE CAN HELP US?
translation.zh: 你找的那位女士…她是谁？ 她真能帮我们吗？

translation.en: SHE WAS THE ONE PERSON I COULD ALWAYS COUNT ON. I OWE HER A LOT.
translation.zh: 她是我唯一能信任的人 我欠她太多了

translation.en: ALTHOUGH I DON'T THINK I EVER TOLD HER THAT. YOU SHOULD.
translation.zh: 可惜一直没对她说 你应该说

translation.en: [ Rumbling Sound ] SHH. YOU HEAR THAT?
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？

translation.en: THE OCEAN!
translation.zh: 是海洋

translation.en: THEY WANT THE EGGS,
translation.zh: 它们在向我们要蛋

translation.en: OTHERWISE WE'D BE DEAD ALREADY.
translation.zh: 否则我们早死了

translation.en: EVERYBODY GET DOWN. SHE'S CHALLENGING US.
translation.zh: 大家蹲下来 它在向我们挑战

translation.en: SHE THINKS YOU STOLE THE EGGS.
translation.zh: 它以为你偷了蛋

translation.en: - GET BEHIND ME. - [ Hissing ]
translation.zh: 到我后面去

translation.en: GIVE ME THE EGGS.
translation.zh: 把蛋给我

translation.en: DO IT, MOM.
translation.zh: 妈 快给它

translation.en: NO! NO, NO, NO. CALL FOR HELP.
translation.zh: 不对 要发求救信号

translation.en: THAT'S A HELICOPTER.
translation.zh: 是直升机

translation.en: [ Over Bullhorn ] DR. GRANT? DR. ALAN GRANT?
translation.zh: 格兰特博士？

translation.en: STOP! THAT'S A VERY BAD IDEA!
translation.zh: 不要叫 那样太危险了

translation.en: WOW. YOU HAVE TO THANK HER NOW. SHE SENT THE NAVY AND THE MARINES!
translation.zh: 哇 你一定要好好谢她 连海军和海军陆战队都出动了

translation.en: GOD BLESS YOU, ELLIE.
translation.zh: 艾丽 你真是救命恩人

translation.en: DR. GRANT, THIS MAN WITH YOU? WHAT?
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 这个人是和你一起来的吗？ 谁？

translation.en: HEY, YOU MADE IT.
translation.zh: 你逃出来了

translation.en: YEAH.
translation.zh: 是呀

translation.en: I RESCUED YOUR HAT.
translation.zh: 我救了你的帽子

translation.en: DR. GRANT, WE NEED TO GO NOW.
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 我们得起飞了

translation.en: OH, YEAH.
translation.zh: 喔 是呀

translation.en: WELL, THAT'S THE IMPORTANT THING.
translation.zh: 这倒是挺重要的

translation.en: DR. GRANT!
translation.zh: 格兰特博士

translation.en: CAN I GET YOU TO SIT HERE AND BUCKLE UP, SIR?
translation.zh: 请你坐下来 系上安全带

translation.en: [ Pilot ] SEA SHADOW DUST STORM ZERO FIVE, SIX SOULS ON BOARD.
translation.zh: 海影对尘暴 一共援救了五人

translation.en: [ Control Tower ] DUST STORM SEA SHADOW, ROGER. GOOD WORK.
translation.zh: 尘暴对海影 知道了 干得好

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL IS THAT?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼呀？

translation.en: [ Eric ] DR. GRANT, LOOK!
translation.zh: 格兰特博士 你快看

translation.en: WHERE DO YOU THINK THEY'RE GOING?
translation.zh: 它们要飞到哪里去？

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW. MAYBE JUST LOOKING FOR NEW NESTING GROUNDS.
translation.zh: 不知道 也许去找新地方筑巢

translation.en: IT'S A WHOLE NEW WORLD FOR THEM.
translation.zh: 对他们来说外面是全新的世界

translation.en: I DARE 'EM TO NEST IN ENID, OKLAHOMA.
translation.zh: 别想到俄克拉荷马州来筑巢

translation.en: LET'S GO HOME.
translation.zh: 咱们回家吧！
